headline: Trump Trade: Trump slams Powell while Fed chair appears before Congress
summary: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: CEASEFIRE: President Donald Trump posted to Truth Social on Monday night that there has been a “complete and total” ceasefire between Israel and Iran. headline: This Low-Cost Oil and Gas Producer is Well-Positioned to Withstand High Market Volatility
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) is one of the 12 Best Natural Gas Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) has transformed itself into a low-cost oil and gas producer, with a cost-to-supply of less than $40 a barrel in the U.S. and internationally, allowing it to not only survive but thrive in the recent market volatility. […]
